bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Internation Standard
Systems and Software Engineering -- Systems and Software Assurance -- Part 4: Assurance in the Life Cycle
IEEE Draft Internation Standard - Systems and Software Engineering -- Systems and Software Assurance -- Part 4: Assurance in the Life Cycle

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides guidance and recommendations for assurance of a selected claim about the system-of-interest by achieving the claim and showing the achievement. The guidance and recommendations are given in a System Assurance process view on top of ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and a Software Assurance process view on top of ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
